relationship_types.complements: Documents that enhance each other when read together. High confidence indicates strong recommendation.
relationship_types.prerequisites: Documents that should be read before the current document. Lower confidence = optional background.
relationship_types.specializations: Documents needed only under specific conditions. Check condition field before loading.
relationship_types.leads_to: Natural navigation path from overview to detailed content.

usage_instructions.for_agents: After reading a document, check its graph entry for related docs. Load 'complements' with confidence > 0.80. Check 'specializations' conditions against current task context.

confidence_thresholds.medium: 0.70-0.89 - Load if task complexity warrants it
confidence_thresholds.low: < 0.70 - Optional, load only if explicitly needed

usage_instructions.condition_evaluation: Evaluate specializations conditions using task context. Common conditions: kubernetes_system, selinux_cve, package_update, kernel_update, batch_remediation.
